TopicTitle: Regarding the debate aobut rocket builders...

Articles.Content:
Now this has most likely been suggested before, but how about a community made rocket builders website?


[LIST]
[*]Considering it would be strictly rocket builders, this leaves room to focus on that specifically, which means rocket builders specific features.
[*]The mods of this forum would not have to deal with it.
[*]The rules could be flexible.
[/LIST]

[/discuss]
